SummaryEnglish: In the ancient dynasty, Princess Jingzhe keeps her beloved blue silk umbrella in the Hall of Memories, wishing it could accompany the legendary Black Jade Sword of the brave general of that era. The spirit of the umbrella, Qingdai, seeks to fulfill her owner's wish and finds the spirit of the sword, Wanggui, in the same place. However, Wanggui is thirsty for revenge and escapes in search of justice. To prevent him from starting a war, Qingdai joins forces with Muyang, a talented craftsman, embarking on an exciting adventure to find Wanggui. As they face dangers and challenges, their valuable collaboration manages to transform hatred into peace and stop an unprecedented threat in the Hall of Memories. However, this achievement does not come without a high cost...
